column5: Hey everybody I drove over the skyway bridge today and caught a glimpse of the fishermans pier. I was wondering if there would be anything (trout and salmon wise)hanging around there this time of year or would it pretty well be dead? If there is anything there, would I be best off casting hardware or drifting roe? I'd like to get out a few more times this year.  Thanks in advance  - Matt
you'd be probably better off throwing lures its hit and miss there and you get a lot more misses than hits there
